item.description:
We'll meet in the parking lot of the Bikeway Source Store. Look for the big red barn. After the walk we'll have lunch at a nearby restaurant for those interested. You can rent bikes and helmets if necessary at the Bikeway Source store.

Our Address:
111 South Road
Bedford, MA 01730

Locally:
Heading east on the Great Road in Bedford, make a right at the first light in Bedford onto South Road. We are 1/2 mile down South Road, on the right, in the big red barn. Heading west on Route 62, make a right onto the Great Road in Bedford. At the next set of lights, make a left onto Loomis St. We are the end of Loomis St. in the big red barn.

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: BIKE RIDE MINUTE MAN BIKE TRAIL BEDFORD-
